en: Miss Nelly O'Brien, about 1762-4, The Wallace Collection

Some additional images which are referred to in the Catalogue entries of the Technical Bulletin can be viewed by following the links below.

en: M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, , 126.3 x 110 cm, after cleaning and restoration. The Wallace Collection. (7643x5796px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic). The Wallace Collection. (15248x12340px)

M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, X-radiograph (Computer assembled mosaic), with the effect of the painting stretcher reduced by digital manipulation. The Wallace Collection. (15248x12340px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, infrared reflectogram (OSIRIS). The Wallace Collection. (3800x3112px)

M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, unmounted fragment of paint from the sitter's proper right arm, showing the pigmented glazes over the pale underlayers of flesh paint. The Wallace Collection. (2892x3096px)

M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, paint cross-section from sitter's proper right arm, showing the pigmented glazes over the pale underlayers of flesh paint. The Wallace Collection. (632x2776px)

M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, paint cross-section from sitter's proper right arm, showing the pigmented glazes over the pale underlayers of flesh paint, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (632x2776px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, paint cross-section from highlight on pink skirt, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1164x4164px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, paint cross-section from highlight on pink skirt, detail. The Wallace Collection. (2448x4164px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, paint cross-section from highlight on pink skirt, detail, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (2448x4164px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, paint cross-section from darker area on pink skirt. The Wallace Collection. (1104x4164px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, paint cross-section from darker area on pink skirt, ultraviolet fluorescence image. The Wallace Collection. (1104x4164px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, photomicrograph of blue and white striped drapery, showing the dark glaze on the surface. The Wallace Collection. (4146x3102px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, photomicrograph showing the dark glaze over the hatched white lines depicting the lace cuff. The Wallace Collection. (4146x3102px)
M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, photomicrograph showing the brushshtrokes used to depict the black lace over the blue and white striped drapery.  The Wallace Collection. (4146x3102px)

M1401: Sir Joshua Reynolds, Miss Nelly O'Brien, photomicrograph of foliage on the left side, showing cracking and small blobs of paint, where the poorly dried under layers have exuded onto the surface. The Wallace Collection. (4146x3102px)
